          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Hand 2</string>
            <string language="en">The Hand 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Hand 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Main 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Mão 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Mano 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χέρι 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Mano 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you check yourself on the words you learned in The Hand 1.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you check yourself on the words you learned in The Hand 1. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">body</string>
            <string language="sv">hand</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">body</string>
            <string language="en">hand</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung überprüfen sich Sie auf den 
Wörtern, die Sie in der Hand 1 erlernten. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 3 - wie geht es Ihnen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous vous contrôlez sur les 
mots que vous avez appris dans la main 1. Safir - l'anglais et 
vie active pour des débutants - module 3 - comment allez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você verifica-se nas palavras 
que você aprendeu na mão 1. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 3 - como é você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione vi controllate sulle 
parole che avete imparato nella mano 1. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 3 - come siete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση ελέγχεστε στις λέξεις που μάθατε 
στο χέρι 1. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους
αρχαρίους - ενότητα 3 - πώς είστε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted se controla en las 
palabras que usted aprendió en la mano 1. ¿Safir - inglés y 
vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 3 - cómo es usted?</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
